item.title: MIUI V12.0.5.0.QCREUXM Fastboot update for Redmi 9C EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 9C EEA

Codename: angelica

Version: V12.0.5.0.QCREUXM | 10.0

Size: 3.4 GB

MD5: b2662fe438dffe71c078720733baa113

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Noise could be heard when the screen was turned off in some cases
Updated Android Security Patch to October 2020. Increased system security.

Download: Here
